name: Liquid Gold (jjoshpoland)
description:
Liquid Gold is a game about producing olive oil in a theo-capitalist rendering of ancient Minoa - think a hybrid between Offworld Trading Company and Caesar 3. Optimize production chains to out-sell your competitors in a free market.

Ease into the game with scenarios that teach you one thing at a time.

The final scenario is procedurally generated for infinite replayability. Difficulty settings TBD.

Camera is controlled with WASD or arrow keys, mouse wheel to Zoom.

Hints for playing:
- If you don't have enough resources to build something, don't worry, you will just pay the cost of the materials automatically when building. So you will always be able to keep building.
- In order to sell a good during the market season, you must have enough warehouse space for it
- The market shows a negative number if you have sold more than you bought, that's a good thing!

Source code here: https://github.com/jjoshpoland/LiquidGold
